summary: Compilation of my mods for Skyrim applied to content of Dragonborn.
descriptionHtml:
Changes characteristics of commonly found creatures, all spells, all base weapons, armor, Bonemold, Stalhrim, Nordic Carved and Chitin equipment. Having Chitin Heavy
armor seemed unrealistic to have because in Morrowind there is only Chitin armor in Light category so to balance the number of light and heavy armor sets I
removed its traces of use (it is still present in game but cannot be
found) leaving only light version. All changes are made for balancing purposes. List of all changes
is included with mod.

Check out my other mods for Morrowind, Oblivion, Skyrim and Skyrim SE:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/8650363?tab=user+files]mithrilarmor[/url]
author: mithrilarmor
